name: Who's your Santa !?
description:
Want some New Year's wonders? We have a story "beautiful" like Christmas in July. Are you sure you're thinking clearly? We will correct this!
The game is a puzzle. Definitely will break you a couple of convolutions.
The game is a test for a sick fantasy. If you pass it from the first time - think, are you all right?
The game, after which you will need 5 years of enhanced psychotherapy. By the way, we, too.
Do not say then that you were not warned!
You have friends? Break their brains!
Do you have enemies? Break their brains!
Do you have a YouTube channel? You know what to do.



Features of the game
1) A story that you can forget only by erasing memory
2) Locations with a sick fantasy, black humor and banter over stereotypes
3) Four soundtracks that you want to send to a permanent playlist
4) Trading Cards
5) Achievements



By the way, after the release of this game, Greenlight was closed. But it is not exactly.
Ready? Well, good luck!

XOXO
